sentences.en: For He does not afflict willingly Or grieve the sons of men.
sentences.cn: 哀3:33因他并不甘心使人受苦、人忧愁.

sentences.en: He needed to grieve before he could achieve a sense of closure.
sentences.cn: 在能够获得一种解脱感之前,他应当感到痛苦和伤心才是.

sentences.en: I grieve very much for what I have done.
sentences.cn: 我为自己的行为感到痛心.

sentences.en: I shall not grieve at her death.
sentences.cn: 对于她的死,我一点也不难过.

sentences.en: I shall not grieve at his death.
sentences.cn: 对于他的死,我一点也不难过.

sentences.en: It is too late to grieve when the chance is past.
My aunt, it grieves me to say, gets things confused.
sentences.cn: 我的姑妈，说起来我很难过，她有点颠三倒四的。

sentences.en: People need time to grieve after the death of a loved one.
sentences.cn: 人们在所爱之人去世后会有一段悲伤期。

sentences.en: Please say to me,'I won't grieve over your death.'
sentences.cn: 请你对我说: ‘ 我不会为你的死而悲伤. ’

sentences.en: Rejoice, and men will seek you; Grieve and they turn and go.
sentences.cn: 你欢喜, 人们会与你相随; 你忧伤,人们则会转身离去.

sentences.en: She grieved the loss of her only son.
sentences.cn: 她因为失去唯一的儿子而悲痛。

sentences.en: The fox mourns over the death of the hare, and so animals grieve for their kind.
sentences.cn: 兔死狐悲, 物伤其类.

sentences.en: Then he added, raising his voice,'I grieve to inform the society -- in secret.
sentences.cn: 然后他放开了嗓门说, “ 我遗憾地转告 诸位 一一密号. ”

sentences.en: What the eye does not see, the heart does not grieve over.
What the eye doesn't see the heart doesn't grieve over.
sentences.cn: 眼不见,心不烦.呵呵~其实就是眼不见为净.

sentences.en: Who would not grieve upon a gilded chair?
sentences.cn: 谁不愿意坐在镀金的椅子上伤心 呢 ?

sentences.en: You'd better be riding home, or else she will be sick only to grieve us.
sentences.cn: 你最好还是骑马回家, 不然她要闹得死去活来,不过是折磨我们大家罢了.

words.tran_cn: 令人悲伤地；极其痛苦地

trans.tran_en: to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
if something grieves you, it makes you feel very unhappy
